description: Please ensure that if the notice falls within the bounds of the Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), include the following requirements in the description:Estimated quantity of commodity: 2Duration of contract: Date of Contract to 2023-03-31Time frame of delivery: Date of Contract to 2023-03-31Any conditions for participation of suppliers not specified in solicitation documentation:See Notice of Proposed Procurement for details.
full_summary:
================

**Information / Records Management / Recordkeeping Specialists**

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01014616

**Solicitation Number:** 2023-00678

**Publication Date:** November 24, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** December 12, 2022, 5:00 p.m.
**Tender Status:** Expired

**Tender Description:**

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) is seeking a contractor to provide Information / Records Management / Recordkeeping Services. The primary objective of this project is to ensure effective management of information and records throughout the agency.

**Key Dates:**

* Estimated contract duration: 3 months (March 31, 2023)
* Delivery timeframe: 3 months (March 31, 2023)
* Participation requirements: Suppliers must meet the requirements outlined in the Notice of Proposed Procurement.

**Additional Information:**

* The contractor will provide services to the CFIA's Regional Office in Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region).
* The successful bidder will be required to submit a comprehensive proposal outlining their approach, methodology, and timelines for completion of the project.
* The CFIA expects the selected contractor to demonstrate a thorough understanding of the Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) and its implications on the project.

**Contact Information:**

Peter Vinh
peter.vinh@inspection.gc.ca

**Attachments:**

The tender notice and supporting documentation are available for download at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/24/19e9e690c2948c0bcbd038cea3d975b3/2023-00678-npp_e.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/24/19e9e690c2948c0bcbd038cea3d975b3/2023-00678-npp_e.pdf) (English) and [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/24/0b41e4ccd137f6c02173f032e3fc920b/2023-00678-npp_f.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/24/0b41e4ccd137f6c02173f032e3fc920b/2023-00678-npp_f
